name: Naphthalene

energies.comment: Two fused aromatic rings. Resonance energy ~255 kJ/mol (1.7× benzene, not 2×). Naive (localized cyclohexatriene×2): ~8645 kJ/mol. Actual (with aromatic stabilization): ~8900 kJ/mol. Tests whether aromatic stabilization scales linearly or shows diminishing returns.

reference_energies.comment: Standard bond energies for naive calculation

notes: Resonance energy ~255 kJ/mol vs. benzene's ~150 kJ/mol
NOT 2× benzene → aromatic stabilization doesn't scale linearly!
Tests: does ring fusion create new patterns?
Ring fusion creates additional constraints - central C-C bond shared
